{"id":365555092,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1594553061,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/365555092/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Bits","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    uint32_t reverseBits(uint32_t n) {\n        uint32_t fbit = 1; \n        uint32_t bbit = 0x80000000; \n        for (int i = 0; i < 16; ++i) {\n            bool r = fbit & n; \n            bool l = bbit & n; \n            \n            if (l != r) {\n                if (l) {\n                    n &= ~bbit;\n                } else {\n                    n |= bbit; \n                }\n                \n                if (r) {\n                    n &= ~fbit; \n                } else {\n                    n |= fbit; \n                }\n            }\n            fbit = fbit << 1; \n            bbit = bbit >> 1; \n        }\n        return n; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-bits"}
